{"name": "Assumption Food Bank", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* To arrive no later than 11:30am
* If the person has children - Proof from the current school with the child's info or DHS Printout 
* Bring valid D.C. photo identification or proof of residency 
* Must be Ward 8 residents", "email": "", "url": "http://assumptiondc.org/outr each/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "220 Highview Place Southeast", "address_2": null, "city": "Southeast Washington", "state_province": "DC", "postal_code": "20032", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.8415138, "longitude": -77.0045809}, "phones": [{"number": "(202) 561-5941", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}]}
